metadata.title: ¡Bienvenidos al Blog de Brakeza3D!
metadata.description: Brakeza.com is reborn as a site specifically designed as a technical documentation repository and download hub for the Brakeza 3D Engine.

blogPosts.content:
Brakeza.com is reborn as a site specifically designed as a technical documentation repository and download hub for the Brakeza 3D Engine.

To expand our community, the website and documentation have been completely rewritten in English. You will find new multimedia content and a wide variety of code examples!
